reviewtext: I used this speaker set for more than half a year now, and it served me great.  The sound quality is good (don't expect hi-fi quality sound, of course).  The sub-woofer is sounds great, too.  At the back it can accept 2 line input, so I can connect my 2 PC to the same box w/o problem.  Generally, it is a very good computer speaker.
summary: Great set of speaker at great price
